name: Alibre Design Part
summary: An AD_PRT file is a part file used by Alibre Design Professional and Alibre Design Expert, which are 3D CAD programs. It contains a part that users can import into Alibre Design and add to an assembly. AD_PRT files can be exported from Alibre Design as .STEP files, for use in other CAD programs.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
